Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 66th overall pick, by West Texas in 1966...
Earned first career win on 4/15/1971...
Had first career hit on 7/5/1972, off Leon Davis (PEN)...
Signed as a free agent by Malibu on 2/5/1977 to a 3-year deal worth $5,000,000 per year...
Was selected to the 1979 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Northeastern on 2/3/1983 to a 1-year deal worth $1,800,000 per year...
